name: Infinite Runner (Elated_Baguette)
description: This Game is an infinite platformer game with which the player can evade enemies, traverse platforms, and enjoy the scenery.  The controls allow the player to move using the arrow keys jump with spacebar and exit using R.  This is an early build of the game and the infinite nature has left the spawns of the initial platforms inconsistent. The player may need to  restart a few times to move onto a platform when they're spawned in.  The enemies are also a work in progress and have been temporarily removed to avoid conflicts with the player's code.
